name: Fight of Animals: Legend of the Strongest Creature
overview: Fight of Animals introduces players to a quirky and hilarious world where muscular animals face off in a 1-v-1 2.5D indie fighting game. Players can enjoy battling it out with a variety of unconventional characters, such as the muscular Shiba Inu, Power Hook Dog, and the laser-eyed Slender Cat. The game utilizes a simple yet deep fighting system, allowing for a combination of light, heavy, and skill attacks that can lead to super skill moves when the meter is filled. Features: • Meme Animals such as Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel, and more have now become Fighters • Simple Controls & Funny Animals & Exciting Battles • Choose your favorite animal and join the fight • Players can fight through arcade mode to become the King of Animals
